endpoints.description: Retrieve a list of all registered medical devices with their respective details.
Register a new medical device by providing its specifications and sensor details.
Retrieve the current operational status and performance metrics of the specified device.
Update the device's information, such as location or specifications.
Access generated analytical reports about device usage and health trends.
Create a new alert based on specified maintenance or operational thresholds for devices.
Retrieve the current predictive maintenance schedule for all devices.
Modify the maintenance schedule entries by specifying new tasks and timelines.
Remove a device from the tracking system, ceasing its monitoring and maintenance scheduling.
Retrieve raw data from the specified sensor for informed diagnostics and analysis.
